issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Getting error trying to create Jira ticket via Appcelerator

comments.body: Hello, The issue is not valid, JIRA ticket creation is working. Can you be more specific about what you are trying to do? And how you are proceeding? Thanks.
